provider.name: AI21
provider.description: AI21 provides long context Large Language Models (LLMs) for integration into applications.

features.title: Tool Calling
features.note: This is currently not supported by Portkey
features.description: AI21 API endpoints support tool use for programmatic execution of specified operations through requests with explicitly defined operations

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate AI21 using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from AI21 and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your AI21 API key from the AI21 console [here](https://studio.ai21.com/account/api-key).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for j2-ultra chat completions call on AI21 using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for j2-ultra chat completions call on AI21 using virtual key
